Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I'm viccie211, I'm a nineteen years old Dutch guy and I love KSP(why else would I be here). I got here because I have a problem with undocking my spaceplane from my Minmus base, however when I wanted to create an account I saw that I already had one. At that point I thought, maybe I should be a bit more active on the forum about a game I like that much.

That's about it so again, Hi.

Welcome to the forums!

I've seen your help request in the other thread and posted something that I hope will be helpful there. Let us know how it works out.

Hey hello there fellow dutchy.

Hope you like it here, this place is just "da bomb".
